name: Civet Biosciences Limited
description: Provider of biotechnology service intended to accelerate drug discovery for live bio-therapeutics. The company's service includes a microbiota bank, a clinical intervention platform, and core big data technology that powers their bioinformatics pipeline, enabling researchers to characterize the Asian gut microbiome and understand the varying profiles across country regions.
